level.heading: Rulemaking.
level.text: The Commissioner may promulgate rules necessary to effectuate the purposes of this subchapter. Rules promulgated pursuant to this section shall not affect an SPFC insurance securitization in effect at the time of the promulgation.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 16-285, see notes following ยง 31-3932.01.
